snippet.title: Rainy Day Games for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

Apple II


Game description:


Rainy Day Games contains 3 games:

Concentration, Old Maid and Go Fish!

All were made for kids in mind, but also players of older age can play those.


What I think:

"Old Maid" isn't fun to play and pretty pointless, "Go Fish" is okay and "Concentration" is actually fun.

And, oh my goodness, the loading takes soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo long!!!
